description: Retrieves a list of data stores.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return in this request. The default value is 100.

nested_items.name: datastoreSummaries
nested_items.description: A list of DatastoreSummary objects.

nested_items.name: datastoreName
nested_items.description: The name of the data store.

nested_items.name: datastoreStorage
nested_items.description: Where data in a data store is stored.

nested_items.name: serviceManagedS3
nested_items.description: Used to store data in an Amazon S3 bucket managed by IoT Analytics.

nested_items.name: customerManagedS3
nested_items.description: Used to store data in an Amazon S3 bucket managed by IoT Analytics.

nested_items.name: bucket
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon S3 bucket where your data is stored.

nested_items.name: keyPrefix
nested_items.description: (Optional) The prefix used to create the keys of the data store data objects. Each object in an Amazon S3 bucket has a key that is its unique identifier in the bucket. Each object in a bucket has exactly one key. The prefix must end with a forward slash (/).

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the role that grants IoT Analytics permission to interact with your Amazon S3 resources.

nested_items.name: iotSiteWiseMultiLayerStorage
nested_items.description: Used to store data used by IoT SiteWise in an Amazon S3 bucket that you manage.

nested_items.name: customerManagedS3Storage
nested_items.description: Used to store data used by IoT SiteWise in an Amazon S3 bucket that you manage.

nested_items.name: bucket
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon S3 bucket where your data is stored.

nested_items.name: keyPrefix
nested_items.description: (Optional) The prefix used to create the keys of the data store data objects. Each object in an Amazon S3 bucket has a key that is its unique identifier in the bucket. Each object in a bucket has exactly one key. The prefix must end with a forward slash (/).

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the data store.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: When the data store was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdateTime
nested_items.description: The last time the data store was updated.

nested_items.name: lastMessageArrivalTime
nested_items.description: The last time when a new message arrived in the data store.

nested_items.name: fileFormatType
nested_items.description: The file format of the data in the data store.

nested_items.name: datastorePartitions
nested_items.description: Contains information about the partition dimensions in a data store.

nested_items.name: partitions
nested_items.description: A list of partition dimensions in a data store.

nested_items.name: attributePartition
nested_items.description: A partition dimension defined by an attributeName.

nested_items.name: attributeName
nested_items.description: The name of the attribute that defines a partition dimension.

nested_items.name: timestampPartition
nested_items.description: A partition dimension defined by a timestamp attribute.

nested_items.name: attributeName
nested_items.description: The attribute name of the partition defined by a timestamp.

nested_items.name: timestampFormat
nested_items.description: The timestamp format of a partition defined by a timestamp. The default format is seconds since epoch (January 1, 1970 at midnight UTC time).

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token to retrieve the next set of results, or null if there are no more results.
